title: Pop Princess
description: A simple twist of fate catapults Lucie Rees from her ordinary life in an ordinary town to a strange, exciting job in Paris as friend to the ultra-famous but troubled young pop star Arizona Kingdom. At first she is more than excited, but soon Lucie finds herself entangled in mysterious happenings that put her and Arizona in terrible danger. Lucie must discover the source of her troubles before itâ€™s too late. Who can she trust? Will the holiday of a lifetime in Paris turn into her last days on Earth?
author: Isabelle Merlin
